title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu in TH (unknown reference), nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option should add the Javadoc for the field in TH.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open TH. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'. Verify that the Javadoc for the field is added.
